definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Added synchronization of truck and trailers license plates.
sentences.chinese: 新增卡車與拖掛的車牌可同步。

sentences.english: This paper presents automatic hydraulic dragging system design.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹自動拖掛液壓系統設計。

sentences.english: Heavily loading a vehicle or towing a trailer may reduce fuel economy at any speed.
sentences.chinese: 任何車速下的重載或拖掛都會降低燃油經濟性。
